title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When creating two projects, P1 and P2, and selecting P2 and closing it, the Open/Close project option is not always available.
EB: The Open/Close project option should be consistently available for both P1 and P2, or it should be disabled for both.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2.
3. Close P2.
